    PyRTLMatrix: an Object-Oriented Hardware Design Pattern for Prototyping ML Accelerators

    D. Aboye, D. Kupsh, M. Lim, J. Mai, D. Dangwal, D. Mirza, T. Sherwood, "PyRTLMatrix: An Object-Oriented Hardware Design Pattern for Prototyping ML Accelerators," 2019 2nd Workshop on Energy Efficient Machine Learning and Cognitive Computing for Embedded Applications (EMC2), Washington, DC, USA, 2019, pp. 36-40, doi: 10.1109/EMC249363.2019.00015.
